title: Who Loses in the Microsoft/Sony Deal? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.20.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get 15% off your first order at http://thirdlove.com/games

Tim and Greg run through Bloomberg's great article about Sony's Microsoft streaming deal blindsiding PlayStation.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:09 - Housekeeping
Greg and Tim are in Florida this week for Full Sail Hall of Fame! See them at their on-campus Meet and Greet Wednesday at 1 PM in the Building 3 EB Lobby. Then, catch them at their open-to-the-public meet and greet Wednesday! Details on Greg’s Twitter soon
The Roper Report   -
00:04:31 - Sony's Deal With Microsoft Blindsided Its Own PlayStation Team
00:21:54 - Sony Launches Games to Film/TV Division
00:24:29 - “Has the day final come for us to have good Video Game Movies?” - Dapper Stephen
00:29:32 - “I can't help but see this as a reaction to how well Nintendo's IP, Detective Pikachu, recently did in theaters…” - Matt Penza
00:33:50 - COD Turmoil?
00:41:44 - “Do you think over-monetization may be the case?” - Ron
00:43:32 - Console Players Finally Beat the Division 2 Raid
00:45:35 - Doctor Who VR Game Announced
00:47:27 -  Ads
00:50:22 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:51:48 - “What is signing an embargo like?” - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:56:01 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Fran & Andrea
